mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, a.`create_by`, a.`create_time`, a.`update_by`, a.`update_time`, a.`sys_org_code`, a.`goods_id`, a.`value`,z.id as product_attribute_id ,z.`name`,z.input_type,z.input_list FROM (SELECT g.id as gid,b.* from pq_goods g ,pq_product_attribute_category t , pq_product_attribute b where g.id = #{mainId} and g.product_attribute_category_id = t.id and b.type =1 and b.product_attribute_category_id = t.id ) z LEFT JOIN pq_product_attribute_value a on ( a.product_attribute_id = z.id and a.goods_id = z.gid)
